entity.name: Armageddon
entity.description: When an asteroid threatens to collide with Earth, NASA honcho Dan Truman (Billy Bob Thornton) determines the only way to stop it is to drill into its surface and detonate a nuclear bomb. This leads him to renowned driller Harry Stamper (Bruce Willis), who agrees to helm the dangerous space mission provided he can bring along his own hotshot crew. Among them is the cocksure A.J. (Ben Affleck), who Harry thinks isn't good enough for his daughter (Liv Tyler), until the mission proves otherwise.

urls.title: Welcome to GOV.UK
urls.description: GOV.UK - The place to find government services and information - Simpler, clearer, faster

text:
@johnvarley @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Got it. I was going off the info on the EA website and your https://t.co/NMOf2Cxf2h bio! Apologies for getting it wrong.

Hopefully everyone sees sense and follows the existing laws around habitat destruction in breeding season, before getting the undoubtedly good work started.

@SianieRoo @NewsNBC @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @MPGeorgeEustice @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA Yes I agree. The process toward this is well underway here and is for the council’s professional officers to pursue free from political interference they might harm their case. As for the EA, I will along with @AaronBell4NUL be ensuring they are held to account for their failures
RT @ChrisGPackham: Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Pro…
